overview: Rahul is a college-going boy who has always longed for the attention and love of his parents, which he feels deprived of. When he meets sexy Sohini, his forgets his loneliness and his mind gets obsessed with her thoughts. A new desire to live works within him. But that Rahul loves her remains unknown to Sohini, the results of which are strange or mysterious events occurring in her life. Whether Rahul is able to win the heart of Sohini or not, forms the climax of the story.
title: Window Connection
